items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The amphisbaena makes two attacks, only one of which can be a constrict attack.

monster.name: Animated Table
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The table is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the table must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the table remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal table.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the table moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar ({@hit 4} a impactar with shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

items.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany tallant.

items.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, or 13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany tallant if used with both hands.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany de fred on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the centaur mummy moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The centaur mummy makes two melee attacks, one with its pike and one with its hooves, or it attacks with its pike and uses Dreadful Glare.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The centaur mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

items.name: Regeneració
entries: The dragonpriest regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If the dragonpriest takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the dragonpriest's next turn. The dragonpriest dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the dread warrior to 0 hit points, it ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the dread warrior drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dread warrior makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: The drow carries three magical bolts, as follows:

items: A {@i bolt of holding}, which casts {@spell hold person} on a target hit with the bolt, as well as up to two other targets within 30 feet of that target
A {@i bolt of blinding}, which casts {@spell blindness/deafness} to blind on a target hit with the bolt, as well as up to two other targets within 30 feet of that target
A {@i bolt of vapors}, which casts {@spell stinking cloud} centered on the point it hits

entries: Each of these effects has a spell save DC of 15 and a duration of 1 minute.

items.name: Shortsword +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí.

items.name: Hand Crossbow +1
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The spy has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, the spy can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the spy has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin veure-hi.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spy makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the spy magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the spy is Large, doubles her damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the spy lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, or 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The spy magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, deals damage, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the spy wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant, or 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead (1/Short Rest)
entries: Erky presents his holy Symbol and speaks a prayer censuring the Undead. Each Undead that can see or hear Erky within 30 feet of him must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from Erky as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of him. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

items.name: Morningstar +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

items.name: Greataxe +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) de dany tallant.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two longsword attacks.

items.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany tallant, or 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany tallant if used with both hands.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gargoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The giant crayfish pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany contundent, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only un objectiu.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The toad pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Cold Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the toad takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the toad can't bite another target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature the toad is grappling. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid and 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de fred at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only un objectiu swallowed at a time.
If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eel makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Lightning Jolt {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the eel touches within 5 feet of it outside water, or each creature within 15 feet of it in a body of water, must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a target takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany elèctric. If the target takes any of this damage, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of the eel's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Immunitat a l'Expulsió
entries: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the lizard can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Empassar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the lizard's turns. The lizard can have only un objectiu swallowed at a time.
If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Greater Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The zombie has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zombie makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Empowered Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Grenl is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} a impactar with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

trait.name: Banded Claw
entries: On one of its claws, the crab wears a rune-covered copper band that makes it immune to being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, and {@condition paralyzed}. The copper band is worthless as a treasure, as the magic is keyed to this crab.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The crab pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) de dany contundent, and the target is {@condition grappled}, escape {@dc 14}. The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only un objectiu.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Grugnur makes two longsword attacks.

items.name: Longsword +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany tallant, or 26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) de dany tallant if used with both hands.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Kaarghaz is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). He knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Chameleon Skin
entries: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin veure-hi.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Kalka-Kylla pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While Kalka-Kylla remains motionless and hidden in its shell, it is indistinguishable from a polished boulder.

trait.name: Shell
entries: Kalka-Kylla can use a bonus action to retract into or emerge from its shell. While retracted, Kalka-Kylla gains a +4 bonus to AC, and it has a speed of 0 and can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Kalka-Kylla makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. Kalka-Kylla has two claws, each of which can grapple only un objectiu.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kelpie pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Seaweed Shape
entries: The kelpie can use its action to reshape its body into the form of a humanoid or beast that is Small, Medium, or Large. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged. The disguise is convincing, unless the kelpie is in bright light or the viewer is within 30 feet of it, in which case the seams between the seaweed strands are visible. The kelpie returns to its true form if takes a bonus action to do so or if it dies.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the kelpie remains motionless in its true form, it is indistinguishable from normal seaweed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kelpie makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Drowning Hypnosis
entries: The kelpie chooses one humanoid it can see within 150 feet of it. If the target can see the kelpie, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} while the kelpie maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). The {@condition charmed} target is {@condition incapacitated}, and instead of holding its breath underwater, it tries to breathe normally and immediately runs out of breath, unless it can breathe water. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the kelpie, the target must move on its turn toward the kelpie by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks.

Before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the kelpie or drowning, the target can repeat the saving throw. A {@condition charmed} target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.
A target that successfully saves is immune to this kelpie's hypnosis for the next 24 hours.

items.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: The mummy wears a {@item ring of fire resistance}.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The kraken pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks. One of them can be replaced with a bite attack, and any of them can be replaced with Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany contundent, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple un objectiu.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken 's tentacles is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 150 feet of it. A target must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany elèctric on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Read Thoughts
entries: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Charisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Persuasion}) checks against the target.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Nedylene carries a {@item staff of swarming insects}.

items.name: Scourge +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The nereid pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Aquatic Invisibility
entries: If immersed in water, the nereid can make itself {@condition invisible} as a bonus action. It remains {@condition invisible} until it leaves the water, ends the invisibility as a bonus action, or dies.

trait.name: Mantle Dependent
entries: The nereid wears a mantle of silky cloth the color of sea foam, which holds the creature's spirit. The mantle has an AC and hit points equal to that of the nereid, but the garment can't be directly harmed while the nereid wears it. If the mantle is destroyed, the nereid becomes {@condition poisoned} and dies within 1 hour. A nereid is willing to do anything in its power to recover the mantle if it is stolen, including serving the thief.

trait.name: Shape Water
entries: The nereid can cast {@spell control water} at will, requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability for it is Charisma. This use of the spell has a range of 30 feet and can affect a cube of water no larger than 30 feet on a side.

trait.name: Speak With Animals
entries: The nereid can comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts.

action.name: Blinding Acid
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) de dany d'àcid, and the target is {@condition blinded} until the start of the nereid's next turn.

action.name: Drowning Kiss {@recharge 5}
entries: The nereid touches one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 3d12 + 3}) de dany d'àcid. On a failure, it also runs out of breath and can't speak for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Water Lash
entries: The nereid causes a 5-foot cube of water within 60 feet of it to take a shape of its choice and strike un objectiu it can see within 5 feet of that water. The target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, and if it is a Large or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 15 feet in a straight line or is knocked {@condition prone} (nereid's choice). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked {@condition prone}.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Multiattack. Nimira makes two greatsword attacks.

items.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany tallant, or 16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) de dany tallant while enlarged.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Obmi makes three shortsword attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Ooze Master is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the Ooze Master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid. Any nonmagical weapon that hits the Ooze Master corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition that hits the Ooze Master is destroyed after dealing damage.
The Ooze Master can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

trait.name: Instinctive Attack
entries: When the Ooze Master casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action, it can make one pseudopod attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The Ooze Master can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm
entries: If a creature the Ooze Master can see makes an attack roll against it while within 30 feet of it, the Ooze Master can use a reaction to divert the attack if another creature is within the attack's range. The attacker must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker targets the creature that is closest to it, not including itself or the Ooze Master. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target. On a successful save, the attacker is immune to this Instinctive Charm for 24 hours. Creatures that can't be {@condition charmed} are immune to this effect.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

items.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The sea lion pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The sea lion has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin olorar.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Swimming Leap
entries: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sharwyn is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Pell d'Escorça
entries: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Sharwyn has a {@item spellbook|phb} that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus {@spell detect magic} and {@spell silent image}.

trait.name: Tree Thrall
entries: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Pell d'Escorça
entries: Sir Braford's AC can't be lower than 16.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Sir Braford wields {@item Shatterspike|tftyp}, a magic longsword that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it (included in his attack). See the Shatterspike handout for the item's other properties.

trait.name: Tree Thrall
entries: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sir Braford dies 24 hours later.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When a creature Sir Braford can see attacks a target other than him that is within 5 feet of him, he can use a reaction to use his shield to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Siren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). She pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Siren pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Stupefying Touch
entries: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic and be {@condition stunned} until the start of Siren's next turn.

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Snarla is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 a impactar with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The werewolf has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin escoltar or smell.

action.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

action.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

action.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Snurrevin is a 3rd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin veure-hi.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant, or 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, or 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany perforant while enlarged.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The duergar magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

action.name: Steam Breath
entries: The statue exhales steam in a line that is 30 feet long and 10 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany de foc on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Var is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} a impactar with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Focused Conjuration
entries: While Var is concentrating on a conjuration spell, his concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Var fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Var is destroyed but his phylactery remains intact, Var gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: Var has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de fred. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Benign Transposition
entries: Var teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Alternatively, he can choose a space within range that is occupied by a Small or Medium creature. If that creature is willing, both creatures teleport, swapping places. Var can use this feature again only after he finishes a long rest or casts a conjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Var casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Var uses Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Var fixes his gaze on one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Var's gaze for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Tecuziztecatl pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Glowing
entries: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

trait.name: Flexible
entries: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Tecuziztecatl makes two pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 4}
entries: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The apprentice is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Doomvault Devotion
entries: Within the Doomvault, the apprentice has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Doomvault Devotion
entries: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant if used with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Keeper makes two battleaxe attacks.

items.name: Battleaxe +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany tallant, or 23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) de dany tallant if used with both hands.

monster.name: Thorn Slinger
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Adhesive Blossoms
entries: The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 11}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
At the end of each of the thorn slinger's turns, anything {@condition grappled} by it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

action.name: Thorns
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Tloques-Popolocas
languages: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Tloques can cast {@spell hold person} ({@dc 14}) at will, requiring no components, but his target must be able to see him.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Vampire Weaknesses
entries: The vampire has the following flaws:

items: Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.
Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is {@condition incapacitated} in its resting place.
Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to Polymorph into a Tiny bat, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its Statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The vampire makes two attacks.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany tallant. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target, escape {@dc 13}.

action.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
entries: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of bats, provided that the sun isn't up. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

action.name: Tloques' Berserker Axe +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: White Maw
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Amorphous Form
entries: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

trait.name: Corrode Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. if its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage.
White Maw can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

trait.name: Killer Response
entries: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two greatsword attacks.

items.name: Frost Brand Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Yusdrayl is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar with spell attacks). She knows the following sorcerer spells:

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, Yusdrayl has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) que involucrin veure-hi.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: Yusdrayl has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.
